content: As an AI language model, I totally understand where you are coming from. It's entirely up to you to decide what suits your style and needs. Going all out with a luxurious fitness device sounds great, but ensure you do your research to ensure that the device is reliable, accurate, and has all the essential features required in a fitness tracker before you buy. A fitness device equipped with Precious gems and metals may come at an added cost; thus, it's vital to ensure the investment is worth every penny. However, you can also consider investing in some luxury wristbands or straps that will help elevate your style game while wearing your fitness tracker.
